snippet: Analysts said Jay Y. Lee, the likely successor of the group's patriarch Lee Kun-hee, chose to keep his father's main lieutenants in place to ensure stability.
lead_paragraph: Analysts said Jay Y. Lee, the likely successor of the group's patriarch Lee Kun-hee, chose to keep his father's main lieutenants in place to ensure stability.

headline.main: Samsung to Keep Head of Ailing Mobile Division
headline.print_headline: Samsung to Keep Head of Ailing Mobile Division
